title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2606.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2606.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to provide
rules and procedures for the New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation (corporation) to provide State assistance payments under the

Financial Assistance to Business (FAB) Program created pursuant to sections
56-0303
and
56-0611
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. The FAB Program is intended to benefit the people of the

State of New York by providing a cleaner environment through the financing of
business environmental compliance assistance projects. This Part will describe
the procedure for applying for State assistance payments under the FAB Program, and explain the FAB Program's technical and administrative
requirements. (b) This Part applies
to all parties seeking or receiving State assistance payments through the FAB
Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2606.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
